text: Peace to Him Who Enters () is a 1961 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Alov and Vladimir Naumov.МИР ВХОДЯЩЕМУ10 военных фильмов It stars Viktor Avdyushko, Aleksandr Demyanenko, and Stanislav Khitrov. ==Actors== *Viktor Avdyushko as Ivan Yamshchikov *Aleksandr Demyanenko as Shura Ivlev *Stanislav Khitrov as Pavel Vasilyevich Rukavitsyn *Lidiya Shaporenko as Barbara, German *Vera Bokadoro as French == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Alov Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Naumov
title: Peace to Him Who Enters
